Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 组织 ASP.NET 移动控件的样式特性。

span.span: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Base 类包含所有移动控件通用的样式特性。The base class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls. 从 类继承的类包含特定于其关联控件的其他样式特性。Classes that inherit from the class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control. 由于移动控件支持的设备多样性，所有样式属性均为建议，并且根据目标设备的功能，可能会也可能不遵守。Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 对象中三个用户定义的样式。The following example demonstrates three user-defined styles in a object. 对象包含三个对应于三个已定义的样式的值。A object holds three values that correspond to the three defined styles. `OnClick` 命令事件将调用 `SelectStyle` 函数，该函数将更改 对象的 属性。The `OnClick` command event calls the `SelectStyle` function, which changes the property of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: Introduction to the StyleSheet Control

span.span: Gets or sets the specified background color for the style.

summary.span: 默认值为 。

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性不同， 属性不从其父级继承。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果在父控件上将 "" 属性设置为 "青色"，则子控件不会继承蓝绿色的背景色;必须将子控件的 `BackColor` 属性显式设置为青色，或者必须设置父控件的 属性，并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性以不同的颜色显示文本。You can use the property to display text in different colors. 可用于颜色的字符串是一组固定的颜色和十六进制的 RGB 值。The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values. 还可以将这些值指定为 "#bb7023"。These values can also be specified as "#bb7023". 你还可以使用 Microsoft Windows 颜色常数。You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅从继承的样式类调用。Called only from inherited style classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来注册支持继承并且其默认值为空字符串（""）的字符串属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to register a string property that supports inheritance and whose default value is an empty string (""). 此未完成的示例包含一个公共属性，该属性的实现通过使用基类的默认索引器属性访问此属性的元素。This incomplete example includes a public property, whose implementation accesses an element of this property by using the default indexer property of the base class. [!code-csharp[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default2.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值必须是 对象的 属性。The value of the property must be the property of a object. 可以通过使用继承或使用样式表的 属性，使用 属性跨控件共享样式。You can use the property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the property of a style sheet. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1)和[创建新样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1)。For more information, see [Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1) and [Creating New Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含 枚举的定义。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |枚举Enumeration|“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| ||00|没有为指定的对象设置大小。No size is set for the specified object. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||11|换行到下一行。Wrap to the next line.| ||22|文本不会换行到下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.|
